website_summaries.verdict: This spot cleaner for your boat is made to clean both exterior and interior marine materials.
pros: Doesn't leave a finish or odd smell
Also does a good job on your boat interior
A mild cleaner that works well for small jobs
cons: Works well on exteriors for spot problems, but not as effective as some others for overall exterior freshening

customer_reviews.title: Don’t go near this product: carcinogens!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to pre-clean surfaces I use 303 Protectant on. NOW having received the product and read the bottle I find you have to wear gloves and eye protection w/ this stuff because it is carcinogenic (!) as per the bottle. But they don’t state that in the description here. You’re kidding me; is this safe to breath? It contains carcinogens and reproductive damaging agents - just to be a cleaner?! Don’t go near this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: 303 marine is great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product with a magic eraser to remove all grime. It works fantastic. I then go over the cleaned upholstery with 303 UV protectant and my boats 2008 interior looks showroom new.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Upman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boat Vinyl and Spa Cover Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is fairly much made for the type of vinyl used in water environments.And after you clean with it ,you should put a conditioner on the vinyl because everything is stripped away.It removed stains and made the vinyl ready for the next step.It is fairly expensive,I did about 64 sq.feet ,but the area was very dirty with one bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Von Maryland

customer_reviews.title: Bought it thinking it would clean sunbrella fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Baby shampoo it probably more effective: Bought it to remove dirt and grime. I frequently use the other 303 product but this stuff is pretty weak. I used a toothbrush and a heavy duty finger nail scrubber. I let the solution sink in for 3 minutes then scrubbed like crazy but even after multiple applications it did little to clean the outdoor patio furniture. Yes, some dirt / pollen came off; however my expectations were higher based on the amazing results from the regular 303 protectant. Save yourself money and try something different.
customer_reviews.author: John Murray

customer_reviews.title: If you've got vinyl, and you need to clean stuff, you need 303
customer_reviews.text: Vinyl is picky stuff. Most cleaners seem to do a good job, but after a couple of years, your vinyl is hard and cracked, your windows are foggy and yellowing. It's not the vinyl, it's the cleaner, stripping the plasticizers (is that a word?) out of the vinyl. Cleaning on boats means lots of vinyl things will need cleaning. Just get yourself some 303 and you won't have to worry about your vinyl going south from your efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I saw lots of great reviews on this brand and decided to give it a try. I used a small brush and microfiber towels and got all the small scuff marks out of the seats easily. After cleaning all the seats I went over them with the protectant and they look like they did the day I picked it up at the dealership.
customer_reviews.author: Logan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This worked better than any other cleaner I have used. I have had my boat for 10 years and The mold and spider feces is a very difficult removal on vinyl seats. The 303 proved to be better than Anything attempted prior
customer_reviews.author: jeff hansen

customer_reviews.title: Best interior boat cleaner I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I'd been told this is what I needed to clean my boat interior with. Went ahead and ordered it and I'm so glad I did! I just gave the boat a full detail and was very impressed with the cleaning power in this bottle. I'm now a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: ljbarnes05

customer_reviews.title: Not much better than water
customer_reviews.text: I really fell for the hype that this product promised. It didn't clean or rejuvenate any better than water. I am stll searching for a product that can actually refresh my spa cover and address marks made by my contractor laying some mats of it for 7 days, which has left seemingly unremovable tattoos on the cover.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Rudisill

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it's expensive, but it does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: More than I would usually pay for this type of product, but extremely happy with how it works. Removes even the toughest dirt, marks, sunburned-on bird crap, etc., with easy. This product is something that will become a staple of my cleaning supplies from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Linda I

customer_reviews.title: not good for plastic/pvc furniture
customer_reviews.text: some of my pvc recliners that we use on the beach. Had some black dirt/mold(?) on it. We washed the sand off let them dry then sprayed them down and let them sit for 10 to 15 minutes and tried to scrub the and the cleaner had no effect at all. In my case, it was a complete waste of money and time/
customer_reviews.author: Alan V Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Developed by NASA-Now you can keep your RV-Car-or Boat Clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a 303 fan for many years and every time a buy a new vehicle I buy a new bottle of 303. If you keep up your vehicles you should never ever have a crack on your dash, your seats, or anything damaged on your vehicles EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Aidea

customer_reviews.title: Good mild cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this product on virtually every surface our boat, from the vinyl seats and sundeck, to the hard interior surfaces, and the dashboard surfaces. It does a good job of getting dirt and grime off, and making the surfaces look new again. I follow it up with 303 Aerospace Protectant and have been happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean
customer_reviews.text: I've done 3 applications including scrubbing with an electric rotating brush, and my boat seats aren't much cleaner than when I started. Find another product, this one doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: 303 Multi-Surface cleaner beats ArmorAll
customer_reviews.text: Not the cheapest multi-surface cleaner for your car's vinyl and dash, but it is the best I have used. I will buy again since it works better than ArmorAll cleaner. After cleaning, top off with 303 UV Protectant, also better than ArmorAll Protectant.
customer_reviews.author: WEW333

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer, but not real impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I'd heard this was the best cleaner for boat upholstery but it didn't clean as well as I'd hoped. The vinyl actually showed more dark marks after use than it did before.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Works great on camper awnings and grill covers
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastic on my camper awning and grill cover. Although they are several years old, they now look like new again. I worry a little about the hazards on the label, so wear long sleeves and glasses, and shower when you finish.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddlin' Dave

customer_reviews.title: tehis product rocks
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean a spa cover that was really dirty. did an amazing job. works great in the car also. much better than I expected. I am a new believer
customer_reviews.author: J. Silvers

customer_reviews.title: 303 products
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it for your outdoor decor. Unless you have the money to buy new every year. I am using it on my canopy as well for maintenance
customer_reviews.author: Esperanza

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine who details boats for a living turned me on to this. One of the best products I've ever used to detail the interior of my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Longshore

customer_reviews.title: This is what the pros use
customer_reviews.text: For auto detailing and auto cleaning you know the difference between Adams, Chemical Guys and 3M products - and those in the know, know.
customer_reviews.author: Maxus

customer_reviews.title: Like this product for my hot tub cover
customer_reviews.text: Good product for cleaning my hot tub cover. Tub is outside and this does a great job cleaning and protecting from the elements outside.
customer_reviews.author: paint lady

customer_reviews.title: Best dang cleaner for vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Don’t even bother with other cleaners this is the one that works. Hands down the best I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Works well on vinyl boat seats
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my boat and it did a decent job. Price is reasonable. Smell was not overpowering like some cleaners. Had to scrub hard to remove mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Kwe

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I used on tent camper vinyl I used product first, wiped off, then spray bottle with water to rinse, then wiped again cleans general dirt, but not stubborn stains
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: Pontoon looks like new
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I use it along with 303 aerospace protectant. Gets all the grime and mold off our pontoon seats. Only product I'll use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful. I have cleaned with so many products and found this to be great and easy to use without a lot of rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: T. Arns

customer_reviews.title: Harsh product!  Do not use!!
customer_reviews.text: Used once. My boat seat is now appearing stained. Don’t know if it took the fete off my seat or what happened. Very dissatisfied with this result. Returned and will never use again.... terrible harsh product.
customer_reviews.author: M Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use but not potent enough to clean my dirty stained trims. I will need to revisit it a couple times.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: great pontoon seats  cleaner
customer_reviews.text: a little pricey, but work great. Followed instructions and it really cleaned 👌
customer_reviews.author: Denise Cote

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Better than armor all. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It cleans very well but doesn’t leave that greasy after coat for dust to cling to. Protects our vehicles , motorhome & boat well.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Auvil

customer_reviews.title: Patio cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I got it for my patio mildew areas and it dies not work at all. Super disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It did not remove stains caused by pollen on our boat upholstery. It is a brand new boat. We will have to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: mecca76

customer_reviews.title: Good results
customer_reviews.text: Cleans as it supposed to. removed all mold and dirt form fiberglass and from seats. I had to purchase more. Happy boater.
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boat cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use cleaner for boats and other similar surfaces. Easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Charles Holdenried

customer_reviews.title: Work good
customer_reviews.text: Husband said it cleaned well but wasn't impressed. Just as good as some other cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: yogini

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work at all. Saw many reviews that were positive but not for me. Tried on 2008 boat interior and didn't look any different.
customer_reviews.author: 2nd 50 Dude

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner. I use it on my all my vehicles, truck, suv and boat. I will probably find other things to use it on. Works great in combination with the 303 Protector.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Great for every surface I've tried it on
customer_reviews.text: Great for every surface I've tried it on. Doesn't leave a finish or have a particular smell. Got pen ink out of a cup holder better than anything else I tried.
customer_reviews.author: John Wohlwend

customer_reviews.title: Used on a boat
customer_reviews.text: Really did a great job taking years off the vinyl seats, and kept them looking great.
customer_reviews.author: MaksV

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Used it on a hot tub cover that was old and dirty, and on a vinyl chair I had. Cleaned them both right up.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Using on our spa cover, keeps the material flexible, shiny, and protected from water.
customer_reviews.author: Verlin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning car seats
customer_reviews.text: Used to clean faux leather seats in car. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Asking Questions

customer_reviews.title: I will recommend this to everyone and wished that I had learned ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is miraculous! My hot tub cover was water stained and I could not believe the results that it made it look brand new again. The combination of the cleaner and then, the protector. I will recommend this to everyone and wished that I had learned about it much sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: First impressions very good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't been using this cleaning and protectant combo for long, but I like the initial results.

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor furniture!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Cleans patio furniture well. This product is recommended by Crate & Barrel for cleaning outdoor furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boat cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pretty much clean everything on my boat , safe for the vinyl, plastics . It is made by 3m so you can trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander P. Karol

customer_reviews.title: No smell or greasy residue.
customer_reviews.text: No smell or greasy residue, just clean. Use it on our boat and at home.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Essert

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not on old stains
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but not able to remove tough weather stains, even with multiple repetitions.
customer_reviews.author: Robsoilman

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on my mercury dinghy
customer_reviews.text: Easy spray and wipe solution to yearly cleaning the mercury dinghy
customer_reviews.author: Howard A. Gorder

customer_reviews.title: It works great. The suds suspends the dirt and you just ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The suds suspends the dirt and you just wipe it off with a microfiber clothe. No residue. I also purchased the Preservative. They both work great. It goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian M. Leon

customer_reviews.title: This did not work
customer_reviews.text: This did not work on mildew stains. I ended up using part bleach, part dish wash soap, gallon of water which was recommended. It did the job.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well to remove crud, dirt, and stains, especially on Sumbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Franks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Man, I love this stuff. It really does clean and renew your plastics and vinyl. I use this on my boat and all my cars. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Smells Strong
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product - surprised all the old lake rats how quick i was able to clean some boats up before summer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I went on several marine sites to research a good vinyl upholstery cleaner. People referenced 303 as a great product multiple times. I am amazed that anyone would give a positive rating to this product as it accomplished little more than fantastic and 409 did on my stained white vinyl boat seats. Don't expect much with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great multi use cleaner to have on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: HBC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use the product in the past and works fine. Arrived on time and is as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Basic cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It did not remove the mold on our boat cushions like I had hoped
customer_reviews.author: Christine B

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner works great but the spray bottle leaks around the spray nozzle when spraying it.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Not sure it really does any better than other cleaners
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. Use it after every trip to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Use it after every trip to the lake and boat seats stay soft and clean.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You still have to do a lot of scrubbing to get spots off the pontoon boat seats.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much choose 303 over other products in my opinion they make a superior product.

customer_reviews.title: Does ok.  Not for all situations.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job as good as most marine cleaners. Does not remove foliage and bug stains.

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the cleaning ability of this product. I've been using it both in my car and around the house. Cuts grease like no other...

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the cleaner and got the protection product. I’m disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: This product was a total fail. It couldn't remove ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was a total fail. It couldn't remove any grime or stains from our boat's vinyl cushions. There was no discernible difference after use, even when I brushed the seats.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy ToesTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the protectant and bought it by accident. So far it seems okay.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McClain

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I cleaned all my patio furniture & rug with half of the bottle. Easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for food value
customer_reviews.text: These are the best products to clean and protect outdoor fabrics

customer_reviews.title: ... the mildew off our boat but it is a good basis cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It didn't get the mildew off our boat but it is a good basis cleaner.

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It really did not clean my vinyl framed windows as was advertised. Totally disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: william white

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t clean off the squirm poop on my motorcycle seat. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Dashnea

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't clean well. I used it on a ...
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't clean well. I used it on a sunbrella fabric and it didn't touch the stain. I used 409 and it came off immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Barb S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean some of the interior vinyl in my new Chrysler 200 a few months ago. It worked well and I had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: sf36867

customer_reviews.title: We used it to clean a super dirty screen house vinyl removable roof
customer_reviews.text: We used it to clean a super dirty screen house vinyl removable roof. Worked great and vinyl looked practically brand new with some brush scrubbing, which surprised us considering the dirt had been on all summer and the roof was now 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Exfitz

customer_reviews.title: but it works best on stuff like the armrests and door panels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my fabric convertible top, but it works best on stuff like the armrests and door panels.
customer_reviews.author: JRDAWN

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: Not too harsh for vinyl but trade off is that it will not remove deep stains.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good Cleaner for pontoon upholstery
customer_reviews.text: This worked well on my pontoon cushions that suffer from surface mold and grim buildup. I would highly recommend for others.
customer_reviews.author: FKL

customer_reviews.title: Okay cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean a convertible top of a recently purchased used car. It was so so. The fabric guard was terrific, however.
customer_reviews.author: FRANCES E SHARP

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product.
customer_reviews.text: Works exceptionally well on auto vinyl upholstery and also patio cushions (OWL). Also has been effective for rug stains that other cleaners have been unable to clean.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Good cleaner. We use this to clean our boat seats after every use. No complaints here, been using for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing, it really works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, it really works!!! Mold and mildew just wiped off and left my boat seats looking like new
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A.

customer_reviews.title: great cleaner
customer_reviews.text: this product works great - had some off white cushions that had signicant dirt - this cleaner worked wonders - they really look like new - I read the other reviews and was hopeful - now I am a believer
customer_reviews.author: N. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I choose this for my Sunbrella fabric outdoors rolling awning in order to clean the fabric from the weathers harmful elements. What a product!
customer_reviews.author: Melvin John Denton

customer_reviews.title: good cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This stuff worked well. I even followed the directions. I does not go quite as far as the lable claims, but my boat top was VERY dirty.
customer_reviews.author: DDDPSD

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as Restoration Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based upon the good reviews. It works fairly easily, but doesn't remove stains as well as the Sunbrella cleaner I purchased from Restoration Hardware. It is much cheaper, though, and does a good job on basic dirt. I haven't tried it in the washer, just hand spotting.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This worked well on our outdoor cushions. I would recommend it. Good for general cleaning with dilution, and also spraying for spot areas.
customer_reviews.author: M L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cleaner for outdoor cushions
customer_reviews.text: Have tried several cleaners but this is the best I have found. Yes, it is expensive but does a very good job. We live in tropical Florida and use our covered lanai a lot and leave the cushions out year round. Be sure to use a brush when cleaning and wipe off with a damp rag. Don't hose it down as cushions will take forever to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Sometime writer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without harm to vinyl
customer_reviews.text: My G3 boat is covered in vinyl instead of carpet. (Love this) The best way to really clean this material is with this product and a soft brush. It doesn't hurt the vinyl like other cleaners. Tip: A really stiff brush can poke tiny holes in the material. Use a soft brush instead.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging for shipment
customer_reviews.text: The product package/shipping is poorly done. The sprayer was attached to the bottle instead of loose so the liquid ran out into the sealed bag. I lost about 1/16 of the cleaner while in route. At the cost per ounce of this stuff I would figure there would have been a cap on the bottle and the sprayer loose. Now I am having a difficult time reading the label because the chemical made the printing run. The product may work well but I would look for a different supplier to buy from, maybe they would do a better job of packaging. I was hoping to reuse the spray bottle and buy the gallon jug to save $$$.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Sunbrella Fabric Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Resolve or something else over the counter would have worked as well. Maybe it's good for big items that do not have to be perfectly clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Homsey

customer_reviews.title: didn't really work
customer_reviews.text: tried this on some sunbrella fabric outdoor cushions, it did not remove the stains on them. The shipment packaging, timeliness etc were all fine, its just the product did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tlight2

customer_reviews.title: Did work better then any other product
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean boat canvas, but it did not work better or possibly even as well as some of the other canvas cleaners that are much more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Crabber

customer_reviews.title: Did not clean my outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't remove any of the discoloration on the chaise lounges. Maybe it works on other materials, but unfortunately I have a nearly full bottle of product gathering dust on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: nabob

customer_reviews.title: My brother Inlaw toll me about 303 and it works so good my white fance looks white again
customer_reviews.text: My husband but sealer on the paver and he sprayed the fance las year I have tried many others products and nothing works. My brother Inlaw toll me about 303 and it works so good my white fance looks white again.thank you

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff
customer_reviews.text: The 303 products are my go-to. They work extremely well.

product_meta.title: 303 Products 30204 Marine & Recreation Multi-Surface Cleaner - 32 oz.
product_meta.description: Thoroughly clean your boat from bow to stern with the only cleaner you’ll ever need. Safe for all types of upholstery and vinyl, the marine version of 303 Multi-Surface delivers robust cleaning agents designed to counteract the damaging conditions of sea and sand. Watch soaked-in stains disappear within minutes and discolored surfaces come back to life. When coupled with 303 Marine Fabric Guard, your covers will stay clean and protected for months.
feature_bullets: Leaves surfaces looking new every time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars594 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
